flawed_nl_solution:
If Jocelyn bought the car 3 years ago at $4000, the car's value has reduced by 3/10*$4000=$12000
The current value of the car is $4000-$12000 = $<<4000-12000=-8000>>-8000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
